code: import R from"ramda";var phoneInitialState={};export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:phoneInitialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"FETCH_PHONE_SUCCESS":{var newValue=R.indexBy(R.prop("id"),action.payload);return R.merge(state,newValue);}case"LOAD_MORE_SUCCESS":{var moreValues=R.indexBy(R.prop("id"),action.payload);return R.merge(state,moreValues);}case"FETCH_PHONE_BY_ID_SUCCESS":{return R.assoc(action.payload.id,action.payload,state);}default:return state;}});
